ygData.subject: RE: Grand Opening!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It *has* happened to me, twice.  Once with lizards in Cazic, and once with cyclopses in Rathe.  At first I thought I d ended up charming the loser, then I
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 22 Nov 1999, Abraham Hardjana wrote:
>
> It has never happened to me but what could have happened was at the time
> the Griffenne that was your pet started it's killing blow it became
> uncharmed. Hence you lose the kill because your former pet was the
> creature that dealt the most damage.

It *has* happened to me, twice. Once with lizards in Cazic,
and once with cyclopses in Rathe. At first I thought I'd
ended up charming the loser, then I realized I still had my
charm target targeted (if my pet had lost, my target would've
disappeared).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
